name: Scatterbrained Memory Match Game
description:
Thunderbecca's Wild Blue ScatterBrain Memorable Memory Art Challenge Card Game with essence of SculptKid

Play the memory match game to see a declaration of your winning status!

Try multiple times by clicking "Reset" to try it with different card variations

CREATORS:    

Unity programming and Card Faces Art: thunderbecca
Splash Page art and Card Back Art:  SculptKid
